Package org.apache.hama.bsp

BSP computing framework.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BSPInterface<K1,V1,K2,V2,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    The BSPInterface defines the basic operations needed to implement a BSP based algorithm.
    BSPMessageBundleInterface<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>  
    BSPPeer<K1,V1,K2,V2,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    BSP communication interface.
    DirectiveHandler
    A DirectiveHandler interface.
    GroomStatusListener
    A listener for updates to GroomServerStatus by groom servers.
    InputFormat<K,V>  
    InputSplit  
    Messagable
    A interface for BSP message class.
    MonitorManager  
    OutputCollector<K,V>  
    OutputFormat<K,V>  
    Partitioner<K,V>
    Partitioning interface which is used to spread key value pairs to a specific partition.
    PartitioningRunner.RecordConverter
    This record converter could be used to convert the records from the input format type to the sequential record types the BSP Job uses for computation.
    Queue<T>
    Job Queue interface.
    RecordReader<K,V>  
    RecordWriter<K,V>  
    RunningJob
    RunningJob is the user-interface to query for details on a running BSP job.
    Schedulable
    This is the class that schedules commands to GroomServer(s)
    TaskWorkerManager.TaskWorker
    An execution unit that will delegate a job for execution
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BSP<K1,V1,K2,V2,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    This class provides an abstract implementation of the BSPInterface.
    BSPJob
    A BSP job configuration.
    BSPJobClient
    BSPJobClient is the primary interface for the user-job to interact with the BSPMaster.
    BSPJobClient.RawSplit  
    BSPJobContext
    A read-only view of the bsp job that is provided to the tasks while they are running.
    BSPJobID
    BSPJobID represents the immutable and unique identifier for the job.
    BSPMaster
    BSPMaster is responsible to control all the groom servers and to manage bsp jobs.
    BSPMessageBundle<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    BSPMessageBundle stores a group of messages so that they can be sent in batch rather than individually.
    BSPPeerImpl<K1,V1,K2,V2,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    This class represents a BSP peer.
    BSPTask
    Base class for tasks.
    BSPTaskRunner
    Base class that runs a task in a separate process.
    ClusterStatus
    Status information on the current state of the BSP cluster.
    CombineFileInputFormat<K,V>
    An abstract InputFormat.
    CombineFileSplit
    A sub-collection of input files.
    Combiner<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>  
    Counters  
    Counters.Counter
    A counter record, comprising its name and value.
    Counters.Group
    Group of counters, comprising of counters from a particular counter Enum class.
    Directive
    A generic directive from the BSPMaster to the GroomServer to take some 'action'.
    DispatchTasksDirective
    Handles the tasks dispatching between the BSPMaster and the GroomServers.
    FileInputFormat<K,V>  
    FileOutputFormat<K,V>  
    FileSplit  
    GroomServer
    A Groom Server (shortly referred to as groom) is a process that performs bsp tasks assigned by BSPMaster.
    GroomServer.BSPPeerChild
    The main() for BSPPeer child processes.
    GroomServerAction
    A generic directive from the BSPMaster to the GroomServer to take some 'action'.
    GroomServerStatus
    A GroomServerStatus is a BSP primitive.
    HashPartitioner<K,V>
    HashPartitioner is partitioning by the hashcode of the key.
    ID
    A general identifier, which internally stores the id as an integer.
    JobInProgress
    JobInProgress maintains all the info for keeping a Job on the straight and narrow.
    JobProfile
    A JobProfile tracks job's status.
    JobStatus
    Describes the current status of a job.
    KeyValueLineRecordReader
    This class treats a line in the input as a key/value pair separated by a separator character.
    KeyValueTextInputFormat
    An InputFormat for plain text files.
    LineRecordReader  
    LineRecordReader.LineReader
    A class that provides a line reader from an input stream.
    LocalBSPRunner
    A multithreaded local BSP runner that can be used for debugging and local running BSP's.
    LocalBSPRunner.LocalMessageManager<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>  
    LocalBSPRunner.LocalSyncClient  
    LocalBSPRunner.LocalUmbilical  
    NonSplitSequenceFileInputFormat<K,V>
    Only for input partitioning job.
    NullInputFormat  
    NullInputFormat.NullInputSplit  
    NullInputFormat.NullRecordReader  
    NullOutputFormat<K,V>  
    PartitioningRunner  
    PartitioningRunner.DefaultRecordConverter
    The default converter does no conversion.
    QueueManager
    A BSPJob Queue Manager.
    RecoverTaskAction
    Represents a directive from the BSPMaster to the GroomServer to launch a new task.
    ReportGroomStatusDirective
    Reports status of GroomServer.
    SequenceFileInputFormat<K,V>  
    SequenceFileOutputFormat<K extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>  
    SequenceFileRecordReader<K,V>  
    SequenceFileRecordWriter<K extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>  
    SimpleTaskWorkerManager
    A simple taskWorkerManager that assumes groom servers are running and may be assigned jobs
    Superstep<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT,MESSAGE extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>  
    SuperstepBSP<K1,V1,K2,V2,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>  
    Task
    Base class for tasks.
    TaskAttemptContext
    The context for task attempts.
    TaskAttemptID
    TaskAttemptID is a unique identifier for a task attempt.
    TaskCompletionEvent  
    TaskID
    TaskID represents the immutable and unique identifier for a BSP Task.
    TaskInProgress
    TaskInProgress maintains all the info needed for a Task in the lifetime of its owning Job.
    TaskLog
    A simple logger to handle the task-specific user logs.
    TaskLogAppender
    A simple log4j-appender for the task child's BSP system logs.
    TaskLogServlet
    A servlet that is run by the Grooms to provide the task logs via http.
    TaskRunner
    Base class that runs a task in a separate process.
    TaskStatus
    Describes the current status of a task.
    TaskWorkerManager
    manager responsible for spawning new worker units for each job.
    TextInputFormat  
    TextOutputFormat<K,V>  
    TextOutputFormat.LineRecordWriter<K,V>  
    TrackedRecordReader<K,V>

Package org.apache.hama.bsp Description

BSP computing framework.
